data.fullContent: Vaccines are biological substances prepared to boost the immune system against a particular disease. They often contained a weakened form of the toxin of virus that they are designed to protect against. This allows the immune system to safely recognize the disease agent as a threat and build up an immunity to it. Vaccines have been responsible for the suppression or even eradication of several diseases.
data.answer: 疫苗是一种生物物质，可以增强免疫系统对抗特定疾病。它们通常含有一种被设计用来抵御的病毒毒素的弱化形式。这使得免疫系统安全识别疾病病原体作为一种威胁，并建立对它的免疫力。疫苗抑制甚至消灭了一些疾病。
